sentences.sentence: Japanese antisemitism is a particularly interesting case.
sentences.translation: 日本的反犹主义则是一个相当有意思的话题。

sentences.sentence: Our grandparents saw, if not the end of antisemitism then at least an end of it being an acceptable part of mainstream discourse.
sentences.translation: 我们的祖父母已经见过，反犹太主义最终被大家所认可的主流观点所摈弃。
